text: @realDonaldTrump @FoxNews The media coverage of your rally is just delayed, once the sewer rats of club MAGA start dying from #COVID19 as a result of your embarrassingly low-turnout klan gathering, you'll see the nonstop news coverage you want. Be patient Bunker Boy, your fans will soon be patients.
